import axios from'axios';const api=axios.create({baseURL:process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL||'http://192.168.1.6:5000/api'});// Add a request interceptor to include the JWT token
api.interceptors.request.use(config=>{console.log('API Request:',config.method.toUpperCase(),config.url,'on',config.baseURL);const token=localStorage.getItem('token');if(token){config.headers.Authorization="Bearer ".concat(token);}return config;},error=>{console.error('API Request Error:',error);return Promise.reject(error);});export default api;
